backend/main.mo: Actor canister defining job posts, schemes, user profiles, and admin‑protected CRUD operations with access‑control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing routing, pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all public and admin routes wrapped in AdminRouteGuard and handled via RootLayout and ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSetti: Dialog for viewing and updating the stored Gemini API key.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUnloc: Inline admin login form that validates a password and triggers authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Ima: Editor for setting an image URL and alt text with a live preview.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Lin: Editor for configuring a button label and destination URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Par: Simple paragraph text editor using a textarea.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tab: Interactive table editor supporting row/column add/remove and cell editing.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tit: Heading editor allowing switching between H2/H3 and editing the text.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteJobP: Confirmation dialog for permanently deleting a job post.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostBlo: Editor for adding, removing, reordering, and modifying content blocks in a job post.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostFor: Form for creating or editing a job post, including metadata, images, fees, vacancies, and content blocks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManageDail: Panel for creating, validating, and publishing the daily quiz question.
frontend/src/components/admin/PhotoUploa: Floating tool for uploading an image, previewing it, and copying its data URL or HTML snippet.
frontend/src/components/AiChatModal.tsx: AI chat modal component handling message state, Gemini API calls, auto‑scrolling, and admin‑configured API key access.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied or login-required message with optional login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks authentication and admin status before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and clearing admin session.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a styled fallback UI and reset button when child components throw errors.
frontend/src/components/FloatingSocialBu: Renders floating buttons for WhatsApp, Telegram, and an AI chat modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyQuizSe: Displays the daily quiz with selectable options, correctness feedback, and explanation.
frontend/src/components/home/Preparation: Shows preparation resources including books, courses, and test series.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickOffici: Lists official external links with highlight support.
frontend/src/components/home/SarkariSche: Displays government schemes with Rajasthan/India tabs, fetching and filtering schemes and rendering a list with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/home/SimpleJobsS: Shows quick job updates filtered by search query, rendering job cards with notification links.
frontend/src/components/home/StudyCorner: Renders study material categories in an accordion, linking to PDFs or external resources.
frontend/src/components/home/VerticalTic: Implements a vertical auto-scrolling ticker with reduced-motion support and pause on hover/focus.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Impor: Shows apply, notification, and official website buttons with availability-based states for a job post.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobDe: Displays job details tables including important dates, fees, age limits, and syllabus availability.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobPo: Renders dynamic job post content blocks such as titles, paragraphs, links, images, and tables.
Displays a job poster image with fallback gradient banner showing the job name.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Usefu: Shows a table of useful links like admit card, syllabus, and notification with availability handling.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalBann: Simple motivational banner displaying a Hindi motivational phrase.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Main layout with header, navigation, search, theme toggle, and global wrappers for routing and UI.
frontend/src/components/SiteNoticeTicker: Displays a scrolling marquee notice with an animated bell icon.
frontend/src/contexts/JobSearchContext.t: Provides a context storing a job search query with setter for filtering job lists.
frontend/src/features/dailyQuiz/dailyQui: Manages daily quiz data in localStorage with get, publish, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/features/homeCards/homeCard: Stores and manages home card items in localStorage with CRUD functions and default seeding.
frontend/src/features/officialLinks/offi: Handles official links storage with CRUD and reordering, initializing from defaults if absent.
frontend/src/features/preparationResourc: Stores study resources (books and test series) in localStorage with CRUD operations for each.
frontend/src/features/simpleJobs/simpleJ: Manages simple job entries in localStorage with add, delete, and retrieval functions.
frontend/src/features/studyCorner/studyC: Manages study categories and items using localStorage with CRUD helpers for categories and items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmitCardPosts.ts: Fetches admit card job posts from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientAdminAuth.ts: Handles client-side admin unlock via password, storing unlock state and session token in localStorage/sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyQuiz.ts: Provides access to the daily quiz stored in localStorage with publish functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeCards.ts: Syncs home card items from localStorage and provides CRUD operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks backend admin status based on actor and identity, factoring in client-side admin unlock state.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPost.ts: Fetches a single job post by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPostMutations.t: Provides add, update, and delete mutations for job posts and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPosts.ts: Fetches job posts filtered by category from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLinks.ts: Manages official links stored in localStorage with CRUD and reorder operations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreparationResourc: Handles preparation resources (books and test series) via localStorage with CRUD operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchemeMutations.ts: Provides add, update, and delete mutations for schemes with query invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchemes.ts: Fetches schemes from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimpleJobs.ts: Hook subscribing to simple jobs in localStorage and providing add/remove helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyCorner.ts: Hook managing study categories and items stored in localStorage with CRUD functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyllabusRepository: Hook fetching syllabus repository posts via react-query using an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Hook managing theme state, syncing with localStorage and toggling dark mode class.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and KBC quiz styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry mounting React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides the admin dashboard with management panels for links, study corner, and schemes, gated by admin authentication.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditJobPos: Allows admins to create or edit job posts using a form, handling save operations and navigation.
Shows a list of job posts for admins with options to create, edit, or delete items.
frontend/src/pages/AdmitCardHallPage.tsx: Page listing admit card posts with search, loading/error states, and link status display.
frontend/src/pages/CheckYourAgePage.tsx: Page providing an age calculator from DOB and comparison date with validation.
frontend/src/pages/ClientAdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing jobs, links, cards, resources, and API key with login gate.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page aggregating job posts, fallback items, and various sections with search filtering.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Renders a job post detail page with loading, error, and full post display including hero, content blocks, links, and details tables.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusRepositoryPag: Displays a searchable list of syllabus posts with loading/error states and direct PDF download links.
frontend/src/utils/linkAvailability.ts: Provides a simple utility to determine if a link is available and return a status label.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageStore.ts: Implements a key-scoped reactive localStorage wrapper with caching and subscription support for specific keys.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL/query parameters, store and retrieve them from sessionStorage, and manage persisted URL-driven state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings using multiple plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, and issues for implementing a visible in-page Admin Panel login flow and conditional dashboard access.
